entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:39 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:39 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
